game.name: Legendary Warrior GR
game.description:
Fighting like a warrior is a dream of many a young boy. However, not everyone gets a chance to enjoy their favorite activity. Luckily, you are getting an opportunity to make this dream come true here at free online gaming platform i.e. atmegame.com. Are you ready to give you such amazing surprises? Join Legendary Warrior GR game and allow yourself to be a part of the biggest action packed world! You cannot take your steps back when people need you to fight against the undead. 
No, you do not have to put extra efforts to stand strong against the evil souls! All you need to do is just put your estimation and precision skill to test to ensure your win in the end. Get ready to destroy the world filled with zombies and deadly skeletons using your bow in this one of the best shooting games for boys! You can kill the bloodthirsty monsters only if you aim your target with the right direction before pulling the bow and releasing your arrow. 
Control this free online HTML5 game using the left mouse button! Try to use as little arrow as you can to kill all these dangerous monsters to pass all 21 levels with three stars! We are damn sure that you have the enough skill for a memorable hunt and wear the crown of being a legend of your country. Common friends! Do not forget to get into the game with the best of your knowledge to save the humanity in this fierce zombie battle! Good luck to be the bravest immortal legend!
